6 ReadRobotMessages::ReadRobotMessages() : loop_rate_(30)
7 {
8  // read parameters from param server
9  using pfuclt_aux::readParam;
10  readParam<int>(nh_, "/MAX_ROBOTS", MAX_ROBOTS);
11  readParam<int>(nh_, "/NUM_ROBOTS", NUM_ROBOTS);
12  readParam<float>(nh_, "/ROB_HT", ROB_HT);
13  readParam<int>(nh_, "/MY_ID", MY_ID);
14  readParam<int>(nh_, "/N_PARTICLES", nParticles_);
15  readParam<int>(nh_, "/NUM_SENSORS_PER_ROBOT", NUM_SENSORS_PER_ROBOT);
16  readParam<int>(nh_, "/NUM_TARGETS", NUM_TARGETS);
17  readParam<float>(nh_, "/LANDMARK_COV/K1", K1);
18  readParam<float>(nh_, "/LANDMARK_COV/K2", K2);
19  readParam<float>(nh_, "/LANDMARK_COV/K3", K3);
20  readParam<float>(nh_, "/LANDMARK_COV/K4", K4);
21  readParam<float>(nh_, "/LANDMARK_COV/K5", K5);
22  readParam<bool>(nh_, "/PLAYING_ROBOTS", PLAYING_ROBOTS);
23  readParam<double>(nh_, "/POS_INIT", POS_INIT);
24 
25  pfParticles.resize(nParticles_);
26  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
27  pfParticles[i].resize((MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * 3 + 1);
28 
29  Eigen::Isometry2d initialRobotPose;
30 
31  for (uint rn = 0; rn < MAX_ROBOTS; rn++)
32  {
33  if (PLAYING_ROBOTS[rn])
34  {
35  initialRobotPose = Eigen::Rotation2Dd(-M_PI).toRotationMatrix();
36  initialRobotPose.translation() =
37  Eigen::Vector2d(POS_INIT[2 * rn + 0], POS_INIT[2 * rn + 1]);
38 
39  if (rn + 1 == MY_ID)
40  {
41  robots_.push_back(
42  new SelfRobot(nh_, initialRobotPose, pfParticles, this, rn));
43  }
44  else
45  {
46  robots_.push_back(
47  new TeammateRobot(nh_, initialRobotPose, pfParticles, this, rn));
48  }
49  }
50  }
51 }
52 
53 ReadRobotMessages::~ReadRobotMessages()
54 {
55  // clean up - delete all variables in heap
56  for (std::vector<Robot*>::iterator it = robots_.begin(); it != robots_.end();
57  ++it)
58  delete *it;
59 
60  robots_.empty();
61 
62  // shutdown function will call SIGINT on this node
63  nh_.shutdown();
64 }

66 void ReadRobotMessages::initializeFixedLandmarks()
67 {
68  std::string filename;
69  using namespace pfuclt_aux;
70 
71  // get the filename from parameter server
72  if (!readParam<std::string>(nh_, "/LANDMARKS_CONFIG", filename))
73  return;
74 
75  // parse the file and copy to vector of Landmarks
76  landmarks = getLandmarks(filename.c_str());
77  ROS_ERROR_COND(landmarks.empty(), "Couldn't open file \"%s\"",
78  filename.c_str());
79 
80  // iterate over the vector and print information
81  for (std::vector<Landmark>::iterator it = landmarks.begin();
82  it != landmarks.end(); ++it)
83  {
84  ROS_INFO("A fixed landmark with ID %d at position {x=%.2f, y=%.2f} \twas "
85  "created",
86  it->serial, it->x, it->y);
87  }
88 }

90 bool ReadRobotMessages::areAllRobotsActive()
91 {
92  bool returnValue = true;
93  for (std::vector<Robot*>::iterator it = robots_.begin(); it != robots_.end();
94  ++it)
95  {
96  if (!(*it)->isStarted())
97  return false;
98  }
99  return true;
100 }

102 SelfRobot::SelfRobot(ros::NodeHandle& nh, Eigen::Isometry2d initPose,
103  particles_t& ptcls, ReadRobotMessages* caller,
104  uint robotNumber)
105  : Robot(nh, caller, initPose, ptcls, robotNumber), seed_(time(0))
106 {
107 
108  // Subscribe to topics
109  sOdom_ = nh.subscribe<nav_msgs::Odometry>(
110  "/omni" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1) + "/odometry",
111  10,
112  boost::bind(&SelfRobot::selfOdometryCallback, this, _1, robotNumber + 1));
113 
114  sBall_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::BallData>(
115  "/omni" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1) +
116  "/orangeball3Dposition",
117  10, boost::bind(&SelfRobot::selfTargetDataCallback, this, _1,
118  robotNumber + 1));
119 
120  sLandmark_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData>(
121  "/omni" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1) +
122  "/landmarkspositions",
123  10, boost::bind(&SelfRobot::selfLandmarkDataCallback, this, _1,
124  robotNumber + 1));
125 
126  // The Graph Generator ans solver should also subscribe to the GT data and
127  // publish it... This is important for time synchronization
128  GT_sub_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData>(
129  "gtData_4robotExp", 10,
130  boost::bind(&SelfRobot::gtDataCallback, this, _1));
131  // GT_sub_ = nh->subscribe("gtData_4robotExp", 1000, gtDataCallback);
132 
133  ROS_INFO(" constructing SelfRobot <<object>> and called sensor subscribers "
134  "for this robot %d",
135  robotNumber + 1);
136 
137  // Advertise some topics; don't change the names, preferably remap in a
138  // launch file
139  State_publisher =
140  nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::RobotState>("/pfuclt_omni_poses", 1000);
141 
142  targetStatePublisher = nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::BallData>(
143  "/pfuclt_orangeBallState", 1000);
144 
145  virtualGTPublisher = nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData>(
146  "/gtData_synced_pfuclt_estimate", 1000);
147 
148  particlePublisher =
149  nh.advertise<pfuclt_omni_dataset::particles>("/pfuclt_particles", 10);
150 
151  // Mark initialized flags as false
152  setStarted(false);
153  particlesInitialized = false;
154 
155  // Resize particle set to allow all subparticles
156  for (int i = 0; i < 19; i++)
157  {
158  particleSet_[i].resize(nParticles_);
159  }
160 }

162 void SelfRobot::initPFset()
163 {
164 
165  const float particleSetRandomInitValues[18][2] = {
166  // OMNI 1
167  // 0,1,2
168  { 0, 6.0 },
169  { -4.5, 4.5 },
170  { -PI, PI },
171 
172  // OMNI 2
173  // 3,4,5
174  { 0, 6.0 },
175  { -4.5, 4.5 },
176  { -PI, PI },
177 
178  // OMNI 3
179  // 6,7,8
180  { 0, 6.0 },
181  { -4.5, 4.5 },
182  { -PI, PI },
183 
184  // OMNI 4
185  // 9,10,11
186  { POS_INIT[6] - 0.5, POS_INIT[6] + 0.5 },
187  { POS_INIT[7] - 0.5, POS_INIT[7] + 0.5 },
188  { PI - 0.001, PI + 0.001 },
189 
190  // OMNI 5
191  // 12,13,14
192  { 0, 6.0 },
193  { -4.5, 4.5 },
194  { -PI, PI },
195 
196  // Ball
197  // 15,16,17
198  { 0, 6.0 },
199  { -4.5, 4.5 },
200  { -PI, PI },
201  };
202 
203  // Sample from a uniform distribution for every particle subset, according to
204  // the values defined in particleSetRandomInitValues
205  for (int i = 0; i < 18; ++i)
206  {
207  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(
208  particleSetRandomInitValues[i][0], particleSetRandomInitValues[i][1]);
209  BOOST_FOREACH (float& f, particleSet_[i])
210  {
211  f = dist(seed_);
212  }
213 
214  // std::for_each(particleSet_[i].begin(), particleSet_[i].end(),
215  // boost::bind<void>(dist(seed_), _1));
216  }
217 
218  // Particle weights init with same weight
219  particleSet_[18].assign(particleSet_[18].size(), 1 / nParticles_);
220 
221  // Put into message
222  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
223  {
224  for (int j = 0; j < 19; j++)
225  {
226  msg_particles.particles[i].particle[j] = pfParticles_[i][j];
227  }
228  }
229 
230  //
231  // float tempParticles[3][nParticles_];
232  //
233  // // for the robots
234  // for(int n=0; n<MAX_ROBOTS; n++ )
235  // {
236  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&tempParticles[0][0], nParticles_, 0,
237  // 6.0, &seed_);
238  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&tempParticles[1][0], nParticles_, -4.5,
239  // 4.5, &seed_);
240  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&tempParticles[2][0], nParticles_, -PI,
241  // PI, &seed_);
242  //
243  // for(int i=0; i<nParticles_; i++)
244  // {
245  // for(int j=0; j<3; j++)
246  // {
247  // pfParticlesSelf[i][n*3+j] = tempParticles[j][i];
248  // particleSet_[n*3+j][i] = tempParticles[j][i];
249  // pfucltPtcls.particles[i].particle[n*3+j] = pfParticlesSelf[i][n*3+j];
250  // }
251  // }
252  //
253  // }
254  // // for that one target
255  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&tempParticles[0][0], nParticles_, 0, 6.0,
256  // &seed_);
257  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&tempParticles[1][0], nParticles_, -4.5,

286 void SelfRobot::PFresample()
287 {
288  double stdX, stdY, stdTheta;
289 
290  for (int robNo = 0; robNo < 6;
291  robNo++) // for 4 robots : OMNI4, OMNI3, OMNI1 and OMNI5 in a row
292  {
293 
294  stdX = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<float>(&particleSet_[0 + robNo * 3]);
295  stdY = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<float>(&particleSet_[1 + robNo * 3]);
296  stdTheta = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<float>(&particleSet_[2 + robNo * 3]);
297 
298  //?????????????????????????????? what next?
299  //????????????????????????????????????????????????????
300  }
301 
302  // Duplicate all particles
303  std::vector<float> particlesDuplicate[19];
304  for (int i = 0; i < 19; i++)
305  {
306  particlesDuplicate[i] = particleSet_[i];
307  }
308 
309  // Duplicate particle weights and get sorted indices
310  std::vector<unsigned int> sortedIndex =
311  pfuclt_aux::order_index<float>(particleSet_[18]);
312 
313  // Re-arrange particles according to particle weight sorted indices
314  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++) // for each particle
315  {
316  size_t index = sortedIndex[i]; // get its new index
317 
318  for (int j = 0; j < 19;
319  j++) // and use the duplicated partiles to sort the set
320  particleSet_[j][i] = particlesDuplicate[j][index];
321 
322  // ROS_DEBUG("Particle at X = %f, Y = %f, Theta = %f has Weight = %f",
323  // particleSet_[])
324  }
325 
326  // Normalize the weights using the sum of all weights
327  float weightSum =
328  std::accumulate(particleSet_[18].begin(), particleSet_[18].end(), 0);
329 
330  if (weightSum == 0.0)
331  ROS_WARN("WeightSum of Particles = %f\n", weightSum);
332  else
333  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(2, "(throttled 2Hz) WeightSum of Particles = %f\n",
334  weightSum);
335 
336  normalizedWeights = particleSet_[18];
337  std::transform(normalizedWeights.begin(), normalizedWeights.end(),
338  normalizedWeights.begin(),
339  std::bind1st(std::divides<float>(), weightSum));
340 
341  // Duplicate particles for resampling
342  for (int i = 0; i < 19; i++)
343  {
344  particlesDuplicate[i] = particleSet_[i];
345  }
346 
347  // Implementing a very basic resampler... a particle gets selected
348  // proportional to its weight and 50% of the top particles are kept
349  float cumulativeWeights[nParticles_];
350  cumulativeWeights[0] = normalizedWeights[0];
351  for (int par = 1; par < nParticles_; par++)
352  {
353  cumulativeWeights[par] =
354  cumulativeWeights[par - 1] + normalizedWeights[par];
355  }
356 
357  for (int par = 0; par < 100; par++)
358  {
359  for (int k = 0; k < 19; k++)
360  {
361  particleSet_[k][par] = particlesDuplicate[k][par];
362  pfParticles_[par][k] = particleSet_[k][par];
363  msg_particles.particles[par].particle[k] = particleSet_[k][par];
364  }
365  }
366 
367  for (size_t r = 9; r < 12; r++)
368  {
369  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(particleSet_[r][0] - 1.5,
370  particleSet_[r][0] + 1.5);
371  BOOST_FOREACH (float& f, particleSet_[r])
372  {
373  f = dist(seed_);
374  }
375  }
376 
377  for (int par = 100; par < nParticles_; par++)
378  {
379 
380  // float randNo;
381  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&randNo, 1, 0, 1, &seed_);
382  //
383  // int m=100;
384  // while(randNo>cumulativeWeights[m])
385  // {
386  // m++;
387  // }
388 
389  // printf("sampled particle = %d, with randNo = %f and cumulativeWeights[%d]
390  // = %f\n",m,randNo,m,cumulativeWeights[m]);
391  for (int k = 0; k < 19; k++)
392  {
393  // particleSet_[k][par] = particlesDuplicate[k][m];
394  pfParticles_[par][k] = particleSet_[k][par];
395  msg_particles.particles[par].particle[k] = particleSet_[k][par];
396  }
397  }
398 
399  // Low variance resampling exactly as implemented in the book Probabilistic
400  // robotics by thrun and burgard
401  // duplicate the particles to add only the selected ones to the new state
402  // float c, u;
403  // Ipp32f r;
404  // c = normalizedWeights[0];
405  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&r, 1, 0, 1.0 / nParticles_, &seed_);
406  // // cout << "The random number r for LVSampler is = " << r << endl <<
407  // endl;
408  // int m, i = 1;
409  // for (m = 0; m < nParticles_; m++)
410  // {
411  //
412  // //printf("Particle weight at %d = %f\n",m,normalizedWeights[m]);
413  // u = r + (m) * (1.0 / nParticles_);
414  // while (u > c)
415  // {
416  // i = i + 1;
417  // c = c + normalizedWeights[i];
418  // }
419  // if (i < nParticles_)
420  // {
421  // cout << "The sampled Particle is = " << i <<endl;
422  // for(int k=0; k<19;k++)
423  // {
424  // particleSet_[k][m] = particlesDuplicate[k][i];
425  // }
426  // }
427  // }
428  // // //cout<<"Max i is "<<i<<endl;
429 
433  // for(int robNo = 0; robNo<5; robNo++) // for 4 robots : OMNI4, OMNI3,
434  // OMNI1 and OMNI5 in a row
435  // {
436  // //Find the Weighted mean of the particles
437  //
438  // Ipp32f weightedMeanXYZ[3];
439  // weightedMeanXYZ[0] = 0.0;
440  // weightedMeanXYZ[1] = 0.0;
441  // weightedMeanXYZ[2] = 0.0;
442  // Ipp32f SumOfWeights = 0.0;
443  // Ipp32f MaxWeight = 0.0;
444  // Ipp32f MinWeight = 1000.0;
445  //
446  // int p;
447  // for (p= 0; p < nParticles_; p++)
448  // {
449  // weightedMeanXYZ[0] = weightedMeanXYZ[0] + particleSet_[0+robNo*3][p] *
450  // particleSet_[15][p];
451  // weightedMeanXYZ[1] = weightedMeanXYZ[1] + particleSet_[1+robNo*3][p] *
452  // particleSet_[15][p];
453  // weightedMeanXYZ[2] = weightedMeanXYZ[2] + particleSet_[2+robNo*3][p] *
454  // particleSet_[15][p];
455  // SumOfWeights = SumOfWeights + particleSet_[15][p];
456  // if(particleSet_[15][p]>MaxWeight)
457  // MaxWeight = particleSet_[15][p];
458  // if(particleSet_[15][p]<MinWeight)
459  // MinWeight = particleSet_[15][p];
460  // }
461  // weightedMeanXYZ[0] = weightedMeanXYZ[0] / SumOfWeights;
462  // weightedMeanXYZ[1] = weightedMeanXYZ[1] / SumOfWeights;
463  // weightedMeanXYZ[2] = weightedMeanXYZ[2] / SumOfWeights;
464  //
465  // CULTstateOMNI4[CULT_IterationCount_OMNI4].state[robNo][0] =
466  // weightedMeanXYZ[0];
467  // CULTstateOMNI4[CULT_IterationCount_OMNI4].state[robNo][1] =
468  // weightedMeanXYZ[1];
469  // CULTstateOMNI4[CULT_IterationCount_OMNI4].state[robNo][2] =
470  // weightedMeanXYZ[2];
471  //
472  // Ipp32f meanWeight = SumOfWeights/nParticles_;
473  //
474  // //particles scaled between 0 and 255 for coloring purpose
475  // for (p= 0; p < nParticles_; p++)
476  // {
477  // particleSet_[15][p] =
478  // 255*(particleSet_[15][p]-MinWeight)/(MaxWeight-MinWeight);
479  // }
480  //
481  //
482  // }
483 }
484 
485 void SelfRobot::selfOdometryCallback(
486  const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr& odometry, uint RobotNumber)
487 {
488  started_ = true;
489 
490  uint seq = odometry->header.seq;
491  prevTime_ = curTime_;
492  curTime_ = odometry->header.stamp;
493 
494  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(
495  1, "(throttled 1Hz) got odometry from self-robot (ID=%d) at time %d\n",
496  RobotNumber, odometry->header.stamp.sec);
497 
498  // Below is an example how to extract the odometry from the message and use it
499  // to propagate the robot state by simply concatenating successive odometry
500  // readings-
501  double odomVector[3] = { odometry->pose.pose.position.x,
502  odometry->pose.pose.position.y,
503  tf::getYaw(odometry->pose.pose.orientation) };
504 
505  Eigen::Isometry2d odom;
506  odom = Eigen::Rotation2Dd(odomVector[2]).toRotationMatrix();
507  odom.translation() = Eigen::Vector2d(odomVector[0], odomVector[1]);
508 
509  if (seq == 0)
510  curPose_ = initPose_;
511  else
512  {
513  prevPose_ = curPose_;
514  curPose_ = prevPose_ * odom;
515  }
516 
517  Eigen::Vector2d t;
518  t = curPose_.translation();
519  Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 2> r = curPose_.linear();
520  double angle = acos(r(0, 0));
521 
522  if (parent_->areAllRobotsActive() && !particlesInitialized)
523  {
524  initPFset();
525  particlesInitialized = true;
526  }
527 
528  // particle prediction step
529  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
530  {
531  Eigen::Isometry2d prevParticle, curParticle;
532 
533  if (seq != 0)
534  {
535  prevParticle =
536  Eigen::Rotation2Dd(particleSet_[2 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][i])
537  .toRotationMatrix();
538  prevParticle.translation() =
539  Eigen::Vector2d(particleSet_[0 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][i],
540  particleSet_[1 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][i]);
541  curParticle = prevParticle * odom;
542  Eigen::Vector2d t = curParticle.translation();
543  particleSet_[0 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][i] = t(0);
544  particleSet_[1 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][i] = t(1);
545  Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 2> r_particle = curParticle.linear();
546  double angle_particle = acos(r_particle(0, 0));
547  particleSet_[2 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][i] = angle_particle;
548 
549  for (int j = 0; j < (MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * 3 + 1; j++)
550  {
551  // particleSet_[j][i] = pfParticlesSelf[i][j];
552  // pfucltPtcls.particles[i].particle[j] = particleSet_[j][i];
553  }
554  }
555  }
556 
557  // publishState(0,0,0);
558  // cout<<"just after publishing state"<<endl;
559  // ROS_INFO("Odometry propagated self robot state is x=%f, y=%f,
560  // theta=%f",t(0),t(1),angle);
561 }
562 
563 void SelfRobot::selfTargetDataCallback(
564  const read_omni_dataset::BallData::ConstPtr& ballData, uint RobotNumber)
565 {
566  // ROS_INFO("Got ball data from self robot %d",RobotNumber);
567  ros::Time curObservationTime = ballData->header.stamp;
568 
569  if (ballData->found)
570  {
575 
576  Eigen::Vector2d tempBallObsVec = Eigen::Vector2d(ballData->x, ballData->y);
577 
578  double d = tempBallObsVec.norm(), phi = atan2(ballData->y, ballData->x);
579 
580  double covDD =
581  (double)(1 / ballData->mismatchFactor) * (K3 * d + K4 * (d * d));
582  double covPhiPhi = K5 * (1 / (d + 1));
583 
584  double covXX =
585  pow(cos(phi), 2) * covDD +
586  pow(sin(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
587  double covYY =
588  pow(sin(phi), 2) * covDD +
589  pow(cos(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
590  // ROS_INFO("Ball found in the image, refer to the method to see how
591  // covariances are calculated");
592  }
593  else
594  {
595  // ROS_INFO("Ball not found in the image");
596  }
597 }
598 
599 void SelfRobot::selfLandmarkDataCallback(
600  const read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData::ConstPtr& landmarkData,
601  uint RobotNumber)
602 {
603  // return;
604  // ROS_INFO(" got landmark data from self robot (ID=%d)",RobotNumber);
605  bool landmarkfound[10];
606  {
607  float d_0 =
608  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[0], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[0], 2)), 0.5);
609  float d_1 =
610  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[1], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[1], 2)), 0.5);
611  float d_2 =
612  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[2], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[2], 2)), 0.5);
613  float d_3 =
614  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[3], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[3], 2)), 0.5);
615  float d_4 =
616  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[4], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[4], 2)), 0.5);
617  float d_5 =
618  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[5], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[5], 2)), 0.5);
619  float d_6 =
620  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[6], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[6], 2)), 0.5);
621  float d_7 =
622  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[7], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[7], 2)), 0.5);
623  float d_8 =
624  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[8], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[8], 2)), 0.5);
625  float d_9 =
626  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[9], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[9], 2)), 0.5);
627 
628  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
629  {
630  landmarkfound[i] = landmarkData->found[i];
631  }
632 
633  // Huristic 1. If I see only 8 and not 9.... then I cannot see 7
634  if (landmarkData->found[8] && !landmarkData->found[9])
635  {
636  landmarkfound[7] = false;
637  }
638 
639  // Huristic 2. If I see only 9 and not 8.... then I cannot see 6
640  if (!landmarkData->found[8] && landmarkData->found[9])
641  {
642  landmarkfound[6] = false;
643  }
644 
645  // Huristic 3. If I see both 8 and 9.... then there are 2 subcases
646  if (landmarkData->found[8] && landmarkData->found[9])
647  {
648  // Huristic 3.1. If I am closer to 9.... then I cannot see 6
649  if (d_9 < d_8)
650  {
651  landmarkfound[6] = false;
652  }
653  // Huristic 3.2 If I am closer to 8.... then I cannot see 7
654  if (d_8 < d_9)
655  {
656  landmarkfound[7] = false;
657  }
658  }
659 
660  float lm_4_thresh, lm_5_thresh, lm_8_thresh, lm_9_thresh;
661 
662  if (RobotNumber == 4)
663  {
664  lm_4_thresh = 3.0;
665  lm_5_thresh = 3.0;
666  lm_8_thresh = 3.0;
667  lm_9_thresh = 3.0;
668  }
669 
670  if (RobotNumber == 3)
671  {
672  lm_4_thresh = 6.5;
673  lm_5_thresh = 6.5;
674  lm_8_thresh = 6.5;
675  lm_9_thresh = 6.5;
676  }
677 
678  if (RobotNumber == 1)
679  {
680  lm_4_thresh = 6.5;
681  lm_5_thresh = 6.5;
682  lm_8_thresh = 6.5;
683  lm_9_thresh = 6.5;
684  }
685 
686  if (RobotNumber == 5)
687  {
688  lm_4_thresh = 3.5;
689  lm_5_thresh = 3.5;
690  lm_8_thresh = 3.5;
691  lm_9_thresh = 3.5;
692  }
693 
694  // Huristic 4. Additional huristic for landmark index 6.... if I observe it
695  // further than 4m then nullify it
696  if (d_6 > 3.5)
697  {
698  landmarkfound[6] = false;
699  }
700 
701  // Huristic 5. Additional huristic for landmark index 7.... if I observe it
702  // further than 4m then nullify it
703  if (d_7 > 3.5)
704  {
705  landmarkfound[7] = false;
706  }
707 
708  // Huristic 6. Additional huristic for landmark index 8.... if I observe it
709  // further than 4m then nullify it
710  if (d_8 > lm_8_thresh)
711  {
712  landmarkfound[8] = false;
713  }
714 
715  // Huristic 7. Additional huristic for landmark index 9.... if I observe it
716  // further than 4m then nullify it
717  if (d_9 > lm_9_thresh)
718  {
719  landmarkfound[9] = false;
720  }
721 
722  // Huristic 8. Additional huristic for landmark index 4.... if I observe it
723  // further than 4m then nullify it
724  if (d_4 > lm_4_thresh)
725  {
726  landmarkfound[4] = false;
727  }
728 
729  // Huristic 9. Additional huristic for landmark index 5.... if I observe it
730  // further than 4m then nullify it
731  if (d_5 > lm_5_thresh)
732  {
733  landmarkfound[5] = false;
734  }
735 
736  // Huristic 10. Additional huristic for landmark index 0.... if I observe it
737  // further than 4m then nullify it
738  if (d_0 > 2.5)
739  {
740  landmarkfound[0] = false;
741  }
742 
743  // Huristic 11. Additional huristic for landmark index 1.... if I observe it
744  // further than 4m then nullify it
745  if (d_1 > 2.5)
746  {
747  landmarkfound[1] = false;
748  }
749 
750  // Huristic 12. Additional huristic for landmark index 2.... if I observe it
751  // further than 4m then nullify it
752  if (d_2 > 2.5)
753  {
754  landmarkfound[2] = false;
755  }
756 
757  // Huristic 13. Additional huristic for landmark index 3.... if I observe it
758  // further than 4m then nullify it
759  if (d_3 > 2.5)
760  {
761  landmarkfound[3] = false;
762  }
763  }
764 
765  uint seq = landmarkData->header.seq;
766 
767  // There are a total of 10 distinct, known and static landmarks in this
768  // dataset.
769 
770  // float weight[nParticles_];
771  for (int p = 0; p < nParticles_; p++)
772  {
773  pfParticles_[p][(MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * 3] = 1.0;
774  particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * 3][p] = 1.0;
775  }
776  // cout<<"Particle weights are = ";
777 
778  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
779  {
780  if (landmarkfound[i])
781  {
782 
787 
788  Eigen::Vector2d tempLandmarkObsVec =
789  Eigen::Vector2d(landmarkData->x[i], landmarkData->y[i]);
790 
791  double d = tempLandmarkObsVec.norm(),
792  phi = atan2(landmarkData->y[i], landmarkData->x[i]);
793 
794  double covDD =
795  (K1 * fabs(1.0 - (landmarkData->AreaLandMarkActualinPixels[i] /
796  landmarkData->AreaLandMarkExpectedinPixels[i]))) *
797  (d * d);
798  double covPhiPhi = 10 * K2 * (1 / (d + 1));
799 
800  double covXX =
801  pow(cos(phi), 2) * covDD +
802  pow(sin(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
803  double covYY =
804  pow(sin(phi), 2) * covDD +
805  pow(cos(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
806 
807  for (int p = 0; p < nParticles_; p++)
808  {
809 
810  // float ObsWorldLM_X = particleSet_[0+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p] +
811  // landmarkData->x[i]* cos(particleSet_[2+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p]) -
812  // landmarkData->y[i]*sin(particleSet_[2+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p]);
813  // float ObsWorldLM_Y = particleSet_[1+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p] +
814  // landmarkData->x[i]* sin(particleSet_[2+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p]) +
815  // landmarkData->y[i]*cos(particleSet_[2+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p]);
816  //
817  //
818  // float error = powf( (powf((landmarks[i][0] - ObsWorldLM_X),2)
819  // +
820  // powf((landmarks[i][1] - ObsWorldLM_Y),2)) , 0.5 );
821  //
822  // if(error>1.0)
823  // {
824  // cout<<"Landmark "<<i+1<<" observation at timestep
825  // "<<landmarkData->header.stamp <<" is at X = "<<landmarkData->x[i]<<"
826  // at Y = "<<landmarkData->y[i]<<" covXX = "<<covXX<<" covYY =
827  // "<<covYY<<endl;
828  //
829  // cout<<"Landmark "<<i+1<<" actuall is at X =
830  // "<<landmarks[i][0]<<" at Y = "<<landmarks[i][1]<<endl<<endl;
831  // }
832 
833  // More formal method is this
834  float Z[2], Zcap[2], Q[2][2], Q_inv[2][2], Z_Zcap[2];
835 
836  Z[0] = landmarkData->x[i];
837  Z[1] = landmarkData->y[i];
838 
839  Zcap[0] =
840  (landmarks[i].x - particleSet_[0 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][p]) *
841  (cos(particleSet_[2 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][p])) +
842  (landmarks[i].y - particleSet_[1 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][p]) *
843  (sin(particleSet_[2 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][p]));
844 
845  Zcap[1] =
846  -(landmarks[i].x - particleSet_[0 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][p]) *
847  (sin(particleSet_[2 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][p])) +
848  (landmarks[i].y - particleSet_[1 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][p]) *
849  (cos(particleSet_[2 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3][p]));
850 
851  Z_Zcap[0] = Z[0] - Zcap[0];
852  Z_Zcap[1] = Z[1] - Zcap[1];
853 
854  Q[0][0] = covXX;
855  Q[0][1] = 0.0;
856  Q[1][0] = 0.0;
857  Q[1][1] = covYY;
858 
859  Q_inv[0][0] = 1 / covXX;
860  Q_inv[0][1] = 0.0;
861  Q_inv[1][0] = 0.0;
862  Q_inv[1][1] = 1 / covYY;
863  float ExpArg = -0.5 * (Z_Zcap[0] * Z_Zcap[0] * Q_inv[0][0] +
864  Z_Zcap[1] * Z_Zcap[1] * Q_inv[1][1]);
865  float detValue = powf((2 * PI * Q[0][0] * Q[1][1]), -0.5);
866 
867  // cout<<"weight of particle at x =
868  // "<<particleSet_[0+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p]<<" , Y =
869  // "<<particleSet_[1+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p]<<" and orientation =
870  // "<<particleSet_[2+(RobotNumber-1)*3][p] <<" has ExpArg = "
871  // <<ExpArg<<endl;
872 
873  particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * 3][p] =
874  particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * 3][p] + 1 * exp(ExpArg);
875  // particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS+1)*3][p] =
876  // pfParticlesSelf[p][(MAX_ROBOTS+1)*3];
877  }
878  // ROS_INFO("Landmark %d found in the image, refer to the method to see
879  // how covariances are calculated",i);
880  }
881  }
882 
883  // if(seq%30==0)
884  PFresample();
885  //
886  // for(int i=0; i<nParticles_; i++)
887  // {
888  // cout<<"weight of particle at x =
889  // "<<particleSet_[0+(RobotNumber-1)*3][i]<<" , Y =
890  // "<<particleSet_[1+(RobotNumber-1)*3][i]<<" and orientation =
891  // "<<particleSet_[2+(RobotNumber-1)*3][i] <<" has weight = "
892  // <<particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS+1)*3][i]<<endl;
893  // }
894  // cout<<"just before publishing state"<<endl;
895  publishState(0, 0, 0);
896 }

898 void SelfRobot::gtDataCallback(
899  const read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData::ConstPtr& gtMsgReceived)
900 {
901  receivedGTdata = *gtMsgReceived;
902 }

907 TeammateRobot::TeammateRobot(ros::NodeHandle& nh, Eigen::Isometry2d initPose,
908  particles_t& ptcls, ReadRobotMessages* caller,
909  uint robotNumber)
910  : Robot(nh, caller, initPose, ptcls, robotNumber)
911 {
912 
913  sOdom_ = nh.subscribe<nav_msgs::Odometry>(
914  "/omni" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1) + "/odometry",
915  10, boost::bind(&TeammateRobot::teammateOdometryCallback, this, _1,
916  robotNumber + 1));
917 
918  sBall_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::BallData>(
919  "/omni" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1) +
920  "/orangeball3Dposition",
921  10, boost::bind(&TeammateRobot::teammateTargetDataCallback, this, _1,
922  robotNumber + 1));
923 
924  sLandmark_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData>(
925  "/omni" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1) +
926  "/landmarkspositions",
927  10, boost::bind(&TeammateRobot::teammateLandmarkDataCallback, this, _1,
928  robotNumber + 1));
929 
930  ROS_INFO(" constructing TeammateRobot object and called sensor subscribers "
931  "for robot %d",
932  robotNumber + 1);
933 
934  // Store pointer to caller
935  parent_ = caller;
936 
937  // Mark initialized flags as false
938  setStarted(false);
939 }
940 
941 void TeammateRobot::teammateOdometryCallback(
942  const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr& odometry, uint RobotNumber)
943 {
944 
945  setStarted(true);
946 
947  uint seq = odometry->header.seq;
948  prevTime_ = curTime_;
949  curTime_ = odometry->header.stamp;
950 
951  // ROS_INFO(" got odometry from teammate-robot (ID=%d) at time
952  // %d\n",RobotNumber, odometry->header.stamp.sec);
953 
954  // Below is an example how to extract the odometry from the message and use it
955  // to propogate the robot state by simply concatenating successive odometry
956  // readings-
957  double odomVector[3] = { odometry->pose.pose.position.x,
958  odometry->pose.pose.position.y,
959  tf::getYaw(odometry->pose.pose.orientation) };
960 
961  Eigen::Isometry2d odom;
962  odom = Eigen::Rotation2Dd(odomVector[2]).toRotationMatrix();
963  odom.translation() = Eigen::Vector2d(odomVector[0], odomVector[1]);
964 
965  if (seq == 0)
966  curPose_ = initPose_;
967  else
968  {
969  prevPose_ = curPose_;
970  curPose_ = prevPose_ * odom;
971  }
972 
973  Eigen::Vector2d t;
974  t = curPose_.translation();
975  Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 2> r = curPose_.linear();
976  double angle = acos(r(0, 0));
977 
978  // particle prediction step
979  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
980  {
981  Eigen::Isometry2d prevParticle, curParticle;
982 
983  if (seq != 0)
984  {
985  prevParticle =
986  Eigen::Rotation2Dd(pfParticles_[i][2 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3])
987  .toRotationMatrix();
988  prevParticle.translation() =
989  Eigen::Vector2d(pfParticles_[i][0 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3],
990  pfParticles_[i][1 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3]);
991  curParticle = prevParticle * odom;
992  pfParticles_[i][0 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3] = curParticle.translation()[0];
993  pfParticles_[i][1 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3] = curParticle.translation()[1];
994  Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 2> r_particle = curParticle.linear();
995  double angle_particle = acos(r_particle(0, 0));
996  pfParticles_[i][2 + (RobotNumber - 1) * 3] = angle_particle;
997  }
998  }
999 
1000  // ROS_INFO("Odometry propogated state f robot OMNI%d is x=%f, y=%f,
1001  // theta=%f",RobotNumber, t(0),t(1),angle);
1002 }
1003 
1004 void TeammateRobot::teammateTargetDataCallback(
1005  const read_omni_dataset::BallData::ConstPtr& ballData, uint RobotNumber)
1006 {
1007  // ROS_INFO("Got ball data from teammate robot %d",RobotNumber);
1008  ros::Time curObservationTime = ballData->header.stamp;
1009 
1010  if (ballData->found)
1011  {
1014 
1015  Eigen::Vector2d tempBallObsVec = Eigen::Vector2d(ballData->x, ballData->y);
1016 
1017  double d = tempBallObsVec.norm(), phi = atan2(ballData->y, ballData->x);
1018 
1019  double covDD =
1020  (double)(1 / ballData->mismatchFactor) * (K3 * d + K4 * (d * d));
1021  double covPhiPhi = K5 * (1 / (d + 1));
1022 
1023  double covXX =
1024  pow(cos(phi), 2) * covDD +
1025  pow(sin(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
1026  double covYY =
1027  pow(sin(phi), 2) * covDD +
1028  pow(cos(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
1029  // ROS_INFO("Ball found in the image, refer to the method to see how
1030  // covariances are calculated");
1031  }
1032  else
1033  {
1034  // ROS_WARN("Ball not found in the image");
1035  }
1036 }
1037 
1038 void TeammateRobot::teammateLandmarkDataCallback(
1039  const read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData::ConstPtr& landmarkData,
1040  uint robotNumber)
1041 {
1042  // ROS_INFO(" got landmark data from teammate robot (ID=%d)",RobotNumber);
1043 
1044  uint seq = landmarkData->header.seq;
1045 
1046  // There are a total of 10 distinct, known and static landmarks in this
1047  // dataset.
1048  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
1049  {
1050  if (landmarkData->found[i])
1051  {
1052 
1057 
1058  Eigen::Vector2d tempLandmarkObsVec =
1059  Eigen::Vector2d(landmarkData->x[i], landmarkData->y[i]);
1060 
1061  double d = tempLandmarkObsVec.norm(),
1062  phi = atan2(landmarkData->y[i], landmarkData->x[i]);
1063 
1064  double covDD =
1065  (K1 * fabs(1.0 - (landmarkData->AreaLandMarkActualinPixels[i] /
1066  landmarkData->AreaLandMarkExpectedinPixels[i]))) *
1067  (d * d);
1068  double covPhiPhi = K2 * (1 / (d + 1));
1069 
1070  double covXX =
1071  pow(cos(phi), 2) * covDD +
1072  pow(sin(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
1073  double covYY =
1074  pow(sin(phi), 2) * covDD +
1075  pow(cos(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
1076 
1077  // ROS_INFO("Landmark %d found in the image, refer to the method to see
1078  // how covariances are calculated",i);
1079  }
1080  }
1081 }
1082 
1083 void SelfRobot::publishState(float x, float y, float theta)
1084 {
1085  // using the first robot for the globaltime stamp of this message
1086  // printf("we are here \n\n\n");
1087 
1088  // first publish the particles!!!!
1089  particlePublisher.publish(msg_particles);
1090 
1091  msg_state.header.stamp =
1092  curTime_; // time of the self-robot must be in the full state
1093  receivedGTdata.header.stamp = curTime_;
1094 
1095  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.x = x;
1096  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.y = y;
1097  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.z =
1098  ROB_HT; // fixed height aboveground
1099 
1100  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.x = 0;
1101  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.y = 0;
1102  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.z = sin(theta / 2);
1103  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.w = cos(theta / 2);
1104 
1105  State_publisher.publish(msg_state);
1106  virtualGTPublisher.publish(receivedGTdata);
1107 }
1108 
1109 // end of namespace
1110 }
1111 
1112 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
1113 {
1114  ros::init(argc, argv, "pfuclt_omni_dataset");
1115 
1116  pfuclt::ReadRobotMessages node;
1117 
1118  if (pfuclt::MY_ID == 2)
1119  {
1120  // ROS_WARN("OMNI2 not present in dataset. Please try with another Robot ID
1121  // for self robot");
1122  return 0;
1123  }
1124 
1125  node.initializeFixedLandmarks();
1126 
1127  ros::spin();
1128  return 0;
1129 }
